value.name: Police: Three arrested in May 14 homicide
value.description: Three suspects connected to the May 14 homicide in Clovis have been arrested, police said Tuesday. Those in police custody include one adult — 18-year-old Xavier Lucero — and two juveniles. Lucero and one juvenile were located in Kern County in Bakersfield,

value.description: SANTIAGO.- With a massive attendance of citizens, the provincial direction of the Ministry of Public Health began this Monday, the vaccination day against Covid-19, in its third stage that includes all people over 18 years of age.
